overview: Wajdi Hassanein, Adel Fahmy and Tariq Mansour, three friends graduate from Alexandria University in 1967, celebrating their success at a nightclub in one of the clubs, where they drink wine and try to try to courting the girls. A quarrel ensues in which they triumph over the cabarets. They go out to complete the evening in one of the Ajami chalets owned by someone close to them , And in a deserted area next to the Chalet pick up a girl who is conducting a taxi driver was seeking to rape, and decides the seriousness of rape, died of shock shock and get rid of the three of them thrown in the sea,
title: Fursan Akher Zaman
